summary: This mod adds a new settlement by Riverwood with 6 female spouses. They are followers and also marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod adds a new settlement by the rivers of Riverwood, with 6 female spouses. They are followers and also marriageable. I paid attention to detail in exterior and interior.
-Please contact me to tell me about any bugs or problems, maybe tell me what you think. This is my first mod XD

 Future Updates:
I only plan to update if this mod gets a decent amount of endorsments. ( So I know if you guys like it ) Anyway...
?An outdoor pool/hot spring, even though there\'s the river
?Unique scripts for the NPC\'s, for instance, where they come from, their history ( I\'m still a beginner though
?I\'ll try to fix some of the Bugs and Problems
?I might move the whole place to a different area, even though i think that\'s very difficult.

 Requirements:
This mod only needs ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3 to work. You can find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1
-Please also check out the other hairstyles Anki has done, they are really good =3

 Manual Installation:
?Copy the House of Beauty.esm into your Skyrim data folder. 
 Manual Uninstallation:
?Remove the House of Beauty.esm from your Skyrim data folder. Simple right?

 Current Bugs:
?The porch outside is not properly Navmeshed, I\'m having difficulties since I\'m a begginer =P, sorry
?Katriah cannot follow you

 Current Problems:
?I accidentally edited my follower Mjoll the Lioness on the same file ( yeah I\'m stupid =/ ) I\'m trying to find a way to reset all the edits I\'ve done
?The door in the house on the bottom floor goes into the wall
?The stairs in the house are to large, which makes you have to jump to get back up

What you can do with my mod:
?Whatever you want! Only ask me if you\'re going to post a mod of your own with mine included ( The area of the settlement is 4 -12 )
?Don\'t forget that the Hair mod is not mine. ( Link to the mod further down ) 

About the Pictures(mods used):
?ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3---http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1
?aKiller Keos Skimpy CBBE Armor Replacer V6-6-8---http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D3654&pUp=1

Credits:
Apachii provided me with the hair ESM file - Link Above ^
The rest I did XD
author: Timathor
